item.description:
Spring Kickoff Afterwork Mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay district.

The first Afterwork Mixer of the Spring returns this Thursday May 11th 6-9pm. This venue has been an afterwork hotspot for Boston's professionals for quite some time, so come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!

Meeting Details: This place gets packed on Thurs nites, so I ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible .My picture is on the site so I should not be hard to find. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.

See you there !

Steven



350 Stuart St Boston MA 02116

Public Transportation:
Green Line to Copley
Orange Line to Backbay station

For more information, see http://http://boston....

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Kickoff Afterwork Mixer Party
